golgui.viewer

Interface SidebarLayoutInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    UserInteraction

    public interface SidebarLayoutInterface
extends UserInteraction
    This interface defines the general behavior of an application which uses my sidebar layout.
    Version:
    1.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  SidebarLayoutInterface.DefaultSize
      Contains the information regarding the size of different pacman.components.
      static class  SidebarLayoutInterface.SettingsPanelOptions
      Contains all available settings panels that could be shown at the lower part of the side bar.
      static class  SidebarLayoutInterface.SidebarPanelOptions
      Contains all available side bar panels that could be shown at the lower part of the side bar.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void reloadSettings()
      This function reloads and reapplies the settings.
      void resetSettings()
      This function resets and reapplies the settings.
      void saveSettings(boolean message)
      This function saves all settings to a local file.
      void showSettingsPanel(int tabName)
      This function let the lower part of the side bar show a specified settings panel.
      void showSideBarPanel(java.lang.String panelName)
      This function let the lower part of the side bar show a specified panel.

      • Methods inherited from interface gol.viewer.UserInteraction

        alert, ask, askOkCancel, message, notification

    • Method Detail

      • showSideBarPanel

        void showSideBarPanel(java.lang.String panelName)
        This function let the lower part of the side bar show a specified panel.
        Parameters:
        panelName - the name of the panel. Should be one of SidebarLayoutInterface.SidebarPanelOptions

      • showSettingsPanel

        void showSettingsPanel(int tabName)
        This function let the lower part of the side bar show a specified settings panel.
        Parameters:
        tabName - the name of the panel. Should be one of SidebarLayoutInterface.SettingsPanelOptions

      • saveSettings

        void saveSettings(boolean message)
        This function saves all settings to a local file.
        Parameters:
        message - if a message is needed to show the result of saving

      • reloadSettings

        void reloadSettings()
        This function reloads and reapplies the settings.

      • resetSettings

        void resetSettings()
        This function resets and reapplies the settings.
